# dropdown-link



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property     | Attribute     | Description                                                       | Type                               | Default     |
| ------------ | ------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `col`        | `col`         | The number of the grid columns that the dropdown panel will have. | `number`                           | `undefined` |
| `panelSize`  | `panel-size`  | The layout of the dropdown panel.                                 | `"contain" \| "full"`              | `"full"`    |
| `panelTheme` | `panel-theme` | The visual color appearance of the dropdown panel.                | `"blue" \| "white"`                | `"blue"`    |
| `text`       | `text`        | The text that will get rendered by the component.                 | `string`                           | `undefined` |
| `theme`      | `theme`       | The visual color appearance of the component.                     | `"blue" \| "dark-blue" \| "white"` | `"blue"`    |
